attributes.action: Reach Post-Brexit driving licence deal for expats living in Spain.
attributes.additional_details:
Reach an agreement for expat Spanish residents that are UK driving licence holders (with an EU branding) to exchange their driving licence for a Spanish (EU) driving licence. 

Extend grace period during negotiations.
attributes.background: The rules for UK driving licence exchange in Spain were very unclear during Brexit negotiations and this issue was exacerbated by Covid creating additional delays and confusion.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616713
